in wadima paminili pramanayak labi aththe polisiyata erehiwa yi. 2013 desambar 30 wadima wada hinsa chodana polisiyata erehiwa daruwan nisa janapathiniya wiya nohaki buruma nayikawa buruma wyawasthawata anuwa thama daruwanta wideshiya rataka purawasibhawaya athnam ohuta ho ayata janadhipathi dhuraya sandaha tharanga wadiya no hakiyi. 2013 desambar 28 'bonna wathura wenuwata petrol dunna' pasugiya badada kilinochchiye di athadanguwata path wu indiya madhyawediya shri lankawen pituwahal kara athi athara ohu chennayi guwan thotupalin indiyawata pamina thibe.
sulu ho ridimak athi nowiya.
